---

```{r Replace NA in a Vector, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
x <- c(4, 9, 1, NA, 5, NA, NA, 10)

x[is.na(x)] <- 0

x
```

---

```{r Repalce NA in a data.frame}
data(airquality)

avg_ozone <- mean(airquality$Ozone)
avg_ozone

# Replace NA
airquality[is.na(airquality)] <- 0
avg_ozone2 <- mean(airquality$Ozone)
avg_ozone2


```
